Root.displayName: 绍兴市政务服务网数据交换对接
Root.description: 绍兴市政务服务网数据交换对接

QuerySql.Sql: SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID ,'' PHASE_NAME ,'' PHASE_CODE,'办结' HANDLESTART ,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'1' DATAVERSION,'I' SYNC_STATUS,B.NAME_ NODE_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME ,'' AREACODE FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' ORDER BY B.START_TIME_

SELECT '33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,'' PROJPWD,'798b8a3a-44c8-4890-b136-3d7a5babb82c' SERVICECODE ,'1' SERVICEVERSION ,'国有建设用地使用权首次登记' SERVICENAME,D.NAME_ PROJECTNAME,'即办件' INFOTYPE,'0' BUS_TYPE,'' REL_BUS_ID ,B.QLRMC APPLYNAME,BDCDJ.GETENUMNAME('ZJZL', B.ZJZL) APPLY_CARDTYPE ,B.ZJH APPLY_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN B.QLRMC ELSE B.QLRDLRMC END AS CONTACTMAN ,'' CONTACTMAN_CARDTYPE,'' CONTACTMAN_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.YDDH IS NULL THEN B.GDDH ELSE B.YDDH END AS TELPHONE ,'' POSTCODE,'' ADDRESS,'' LEGALMAN,'001008006007012' DEPTID,'绍兴市国土资源局' DEPTNAME ,'002577225' SS_ORGCODE,'' RECEIVE_USEID,D.NAME_ RECEIVE_NAME,'0' APPLYFROM ,'01' APPROVE_TYPE,'99' APPLY_PROPERTIY,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECEIVETIME,'' BELONGTO ,'330602' AREACODE,'1' DATASTATE,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' IS_MANUBRIUM,'' SERVICE_DEPTID,'' BUS_MODE ,'ZHSJ17'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'9{0}' SYNTHESIZE_UNID FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_BIZ_PROCINST D ON D.PROC_INST_ID_=A.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN BDCDJ.QLR B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ join bdcdj.slsq sl on sl.ywh =b.ywh join bdcdj.t_lcdy lc on lc.lcdm=sl.djxl WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BDCDJ.QLR C WHERE C.YWH=B.YWH AND C.BSM<B.BSM) AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')<=0 and lc.lcdm='1101' AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}' union SELECT '33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,'' PROJPWD,'982c238d-2b03-45bc-888f-8b507f519505' SERVICECODE ,'1' SERVICEVERSION ,'国有建设用地使用权转移登记' SERVICENAME,D.NAME_ PROJECTNAME,'即办件' INFOTYPE,'0' BUS_TYPE,'' REL_BUS_ID ,B.QLRMC APPLYNAME,BDCDJ.GETENUMNAME('ZJZL', B.ZJZL) APPLY_CARDTYPE ,B.ZJH APPLY_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN B.QLRMC ELSE B.QLRDLRMC END AS CONTACTMAN ,'' CONTACTMAN_CARDTYPE,'' CONTACTMAN_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.YDDH IS NULL THEN B.GDDH ELSE B.YDDH END AS TELPHONE ,'' POSTCODE,'' ADDRESS,'' LEGALMAN,'001008006007012' DEPTID,'绍兴市国土资源局' DEPTNAME ,'002577225' SS_ORGCODE,'' RECEIVE_USEID,D.NAME_ RECEIVE_NAME,'0' APPLYFROM ,'01' APPROVE_TYPE,'99' APPLY_PROPERTIY,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECEIVETIME,'' BELONGTO ,'330602' AREACODE,'1' DATASTATE,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' IS_MANUBRIUM,'' SERVICE_DEPTID,'' BUS_MODE ,'ZHSJ17'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'9{0}' SYNTHESIZE_UNID FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_BIZ_PROCINST D ON D.PROC_INST_ID_=A.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN BDCDJ.QLR B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ join bdcdj.slsq sl on sl.ywh =b.ywh join bdcdj.t_lcdy lc on lc.lcdm=sl.djxl WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BDCDJ.QLR C WHERE C.YWH=B.YWH AND C.BSM<B.BSM) AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')<=0 and lc.lcdm='1102' AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}' union SELECT '33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,'' PROJPWD,'921287c0-4deb-4e70-b390-e432604a361e' SERVICECODE ,'1' SERVICEVERSION ,'国有建设用地使用权及房屋所有权转移登记' SERVICENAME,D.NAME_ PROJECTNAME,'即办件' INFOTYPE,'0' BUS_TYPE,'' REL_BUS_ID ,B.QLRMC APPLYNAME,BDCDJ.GETENUMNAME('ZJZL', B.ZJZL) APPLY_CARDTYPE ,B.ZJH APPLY_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN B.QLRMC ELSE B.QLRDLRMC END AS CONTACTMAN ,'' CONTACTMAN_CARDTYPE,'' CONTACTMAN_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.YDDH IS NULL THEN B.GDDH ELSE B.YDDH END AS TELPHONE ,'' POSTCODE,'' ADDRESS,'' LEGALMAN,'001008006007012' DEPTID,'绍兴市国土资源局' DEPTNAME ,'002577225' SS_ORGCODE,'' RECEIVE_USEID,D.NAME_ RECEIVE_NAME,'0' APPLYFROM ,'01' APPROVE_TYPE,'99' APPLY_PROPERTIY,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECEIVETIME,'' BELONGTO ,'330602' AREACODE,'1' DATASTATE,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' IS_MANUBRIUM,'' SERVICE_DEPTID,'' BUS_MODE ,'ZHSJ17'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'9{0}' SYNTHESIZE_UNID FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_BIZ_PROCINST D ON D.PROC_INST_ID_=A.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN BDCDJ.QLR B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ join bdcdj.slsq sl on sl.ywh =b.ywh join bdcdj.t_lcdy lc on lc.lcdm=sl.djxl WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BDCDJ.QLR C WHERE C.YWH=B.YWH AND C.BSM<B.BSM) AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')<=0 and lc.lcdm in ('2102','2702','2705','2711','2710') AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}'

SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,C.DATUM_NAME ATTRNAME,C.DATUMINST_GUID ATTRID ,C.SEQ_ORDER SORTID,'纸质收取' TAKETYPE ,CASE WHEN NVL(C.ORIGINAL_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.COPY_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.ELEC_NUMBER,0)>0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS ISTAKE,NVL(C.ORIGINAL_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.COPY_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.ELEC_NUMBER,0) AMOUNT ,TO_CHAR(C.GXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TAKETIME,'' MEMO,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(C.GXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'' ENTITY,'' FILENAME ,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' AREACODE FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN BDCDJ.T_XM_PROJECT B ON A.BUSINESS_KEY_=B.PROJECT_ID INNER JOIN BDCDJ.T_XM_DATUM C ON C.BIZINST_GUID=B.BIZINST_GUID WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}'

SELECT '33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,B.SLR ACCEPT_MAN,TO_CHAR(B.SLSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACCEPT_TIME ,TO_CHAR(B.BLTS) PROMISEVALUE,'工作日' PROMISETYPE,TO_CHAR(B.BJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PROMISE_ETIME ,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND,TO_CHAR(B.SLSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME ,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' HANDER_DEPTNAME, '' HANDER_DEPTID,'' AREACODE FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN BDCDJ.SLSQ B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BDCDJ.SLSQ T WHERE T.YWH=B.YWH AND T.BSM<B.BSM) AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')<=0 AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}' UNION ALL SELECT '33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,'无' ACCEPT_MAN,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACCEPT_TIME ,'0' PROMISEVALUE,'工作日' PROMISETYPE,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PROMISE_ETIME ,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME
,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' HANDER_DEPTNAME, '' HANDER_DEPTID,'' AREACODE FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')>0 AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}'

SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID ,CASE UPPER(TO_CHAR(B.DELETE_REASON_)) WHEN 'REJECT' THEN '退回' WHEN 'COMPLETED' THEN '提交' END AS ACTION,B.NAME_ NODE_NAME,D.STAFF_NAME NAME,'同意' OPINION ,TO_CHAR(B.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') START_TIME,TO_CHAR(B.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END_TIME ,'' REMARK,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(B.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' HANDER_DEPTNAME,'' HANDER_DEPTID,'' AREACODE FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN PLATFORM.BT_USER D ON D.USERNAME=B.ASSIGNEE_ WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' ORDER BY B.START_TIME_

SELECT '33060117'||substr(extract (year from A.START_TIME_),3,2) || LPAD (extract (month from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') || LPAD (extract (DAY from A.START_TIME_) , 2 , '0') ||'3{0}' PROJID,D.STAFF_NAME TRANSACT_USER ,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TRANSACT_TIME,'办结' TRANSACT_RESULT,'准予许可' TRANSACT_DESCRIBE ,''RESULT_CODE,'' REMARK,'33060117001' BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,'' HANDER_DEPTNAME,'' HANDER_DEPTID,'' AREACODE FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN PLATFORM.BT_USER D ON D.USERNAME=B.ASSIGNEE_ WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{1}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST C WHERE C.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ AND C.END_TIME_>B.END_TIME_)
